comments.body:
In the documentation Prismic-dom appears to have a default export but this dts doesn't reflect that.

import PrismicDOM from "prismic-doc" failes as no default is defined.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +-1,3 @@import prismicDom = require("prismic-dom");

const rendered: string = prismicDom.RichText.asHtml({});
